column4: Preah Sihanouk: Local authorities say a 13-year-old girl (*other reports say 14) who had been missing from the home since August 17
column5: 2019 was found dead on the afternoon of August 22
column6: 2019.------The body was discovered in Prey Nop commune. Authorities now suspect the girl was raped and murdered. CPU are involved in the investigation------Source: Huy Bunleng
